mockInsights.landscapeSummary: Car Toys operates in a competitive car electronics retail market with 4 key competitors identified.
keyRisks: Best Buy's national footprint provides greater accessibility than Car Toys' regional presence
E-commerce platforms like Crutchfield and Amazon offer convenience that may attract DIY customers
Price competition from big-box retailers could pressure margins
keyOpportunities: Professional installation expertise differentiates from DIY-focused competitors
Custom integration services create higher margins and customer loyalty
Local market knowledge enables better customer relationships

now: Emphasize professional installation quality in marketing
